name: The Normal Dude
description: As his name suggest, just an ordinary guy who wants to take his chances.

helm.name: The Clover Helmet
helm.description: A regular helmet, decorated with a few four-leaf clovers.

armor.name: The Leather Armor
armor.description: Made of top quality snail leather ! (May possibly smell bad in case of high heat)

name: The Rambo
description: It wasn't his war, and he only owes his survival to his luck. And maybe to his muscle too ...

helm.name: The Red Bandanna
helm.description: Purely aesthetic, the prerogative of real warriors !

armor.name: The Oiled Torso
armor.description: Because you never know, you might as well look cool ...

weapon.name: The Big Gun
weapon.description: The one that goes "Bang, Bang, Bang" super fast !!

name: The Barbie
description: Even she wonders why she's here.

armor.name: The Princess Dress
armor.description: Because princesses also have the right to be badass.

weapon.name: The Stiletto Heel
weapon.description: Have you ever taken a stiletto heel in the eye ? It hurts like hell !

name: The Old Man and the Sea
description: He may not have much life or luck, but he can knock someone out in one try.

helm.name: The Fish Head
helm.description: Yeah, it's a little bit disgusting ...

armor.name: The Pink Short
armor.description: I like this color, it looks good on you !

name: The 47
description: Do we really need to explain ?

helm.name: The Barcode
helm.description: It's great for identifying your corpse !

armor.name: The Suit
armor.description: Of course there's a suit ! And custom-made too !

name: The Lieutenant Dan
description: A seasoned soldier. (You may want to keep him away from alcohol though).

helm.name: The Very Long Hair
helm.description: Can be very annoying in the wind.

armor.name: The Hawaiian Short
armor.description: You can't be good at everything ...

weapon.name: The Sassy Answers
weapon.description: Not everyone necessarily understands sarcasm, but it's still dassy

name: The Daddy's Boy
description: Can we really buy victory ? He believes in it.

helm.name: The Golden Helmet
helm.description: Admit it, you didn't know how heavy gold is. You neck hurts, doesn't it ?

armor.name: The Golden Armor
armor.description: Possibility to dazzle enemies ... And passers-by ... and you too ... A little bit everyone actually !

armor.name: The Gondor's Horn
armor.description: Help comes every time you blow it. All you have to do is hope that the orcs don't get you first.

weapon.name: The Long Sword
weapon.description: It's a long sword ... Didn't you read the name or what ?

name: The Mincemeat
description: The challenge made man. (Life is really not easy for him ...)

armor.name: The Poor Man's Loincloth
armor.description: Well, you couldn't walk around naked, could you ?

weapon.name: The Tree Branch
weapon.description: Found on the side of the road, in the dark and with your eyes closed, she looks vaguely like a real sword.
